Name: 方块传说
About the game: Have you ever think of a game ‘Tetris’ that you can play it all day when you're a kid.It brought a lot of joy to the children. ‘Block Legend’ game method reference ‘Tetris’,With immersive VR experience,Use Block to build bridges to go to the treasure house .Conquer monsters and win treasures。 Tetris Change the original way of play.The elimination blocks will stack up to the button,The longer of player's time and the space is smaller. Reach a certain amount quantity and to pass, not need all full. Action combat Handheld weapon with the monster face to face combat, VR immersive combat experience,Winning or losing depends on your operation. Various weapons bring diversity combat experience. Dual-weapon system It can carry two weapons at the same time。A variety of weapons can be arbitrary collocation ， 1+1>2. Ranking list. The higher the rank, the higher the honor.
Developers: 重庆焱玩网络科技有限公司
Publishers: 重庆焱玩网络科技有限公司
